dct_description_sm: This polygon data layer represents watersheds for the United States in May 2005. The dataset was originally published by the U.S. Geological Survey in June 2005.[This map layer contains hydrologic unit boundaries and codes for the United States, Puerto Rico, and the U.S. Virgin Islands. It was revised for inclusion in the National Atlas of the United States of America, and updated to match the streams file created by the USGS National Mapping Division (NMD) for the National Atlas of the United States of America. This is a revised version of the November 2002 map layer.]
